-spec count_complete_subarrays(Nums :: [integer()]) -> integer().
count_complete_subarrays(Nums) ->
    DistinctElements = lists:usort(Nums),
    TotalDistinct = length(DistinctElements),
    count_subarrays(Nums, DistinctElements, TotalDistinct, 0).

count_subarrays([], _, _, Count) ->
    Count;
count_subarrays(Nums, DistinctElements, TotalDistinct, Count) ->
    count_subarrays(Nums, DistinctElements, [], TotalDistinct, 0, Count).

count_subarrays([], _, _, _, SubarrayCount, Count) ->
    Count + SubarrayCount;
count_subarrays([H|T], DistinctElements, CurrentDistinct, TotalDistinct, CurrentLength, Count) ->
    NewCurrentDistinct = lists:usort([H|CurrentDistinct]),
    NewCount = if length(NewCurrentDistinct) == TotalDistinct -> 1; true -> 0 end,
    count_subarrays(T, DistinctElements, NewCurrentDistinct, TotalDistinct, CurrentLength + 1, Count + NewCount).
